channel.title: [317][RELEASE]Matrix [RELEASE][317]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/9374/matrixrsbanner.jpg[/img]
Server Name: MatrixScape Server Base: Deltascape (Dont Flame About this till you read on) Client Base Is: Bluur's.
Credits Server - Delta / Me Client - Bluurr
Please Do No Flam Me, I Only want Advice on how to improve, Not Put Down's.
COMMENT if you like or downloading!!! please rate if you think i deserve
Link's Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?kzgzijkuezu Server: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KG78Q74U Website: http://marvin-mrc.com
Features -Working God wars -new GS Stances -100% combat & skill timers with 100% real emotes -50% xp update not fast and not slw -donation system added already. -donor shop -new pestcontrol -new pking system -new pvp drops/pking skull -and many more.
What I did: -100% combat & skills real emotes and timers -fixed Dragon Claws -new customs -added donor shop -pking exchange -Cleaned Server, Halfed The Size. -Fixed All Bug's I know of From Hiyascape, Including a few dupe method's. -Removed Prayer Draining, Lag's Server, No Need. -Removed All Npc speech's that were above their head, For example, "General store trade me!" Lag's Server, No need for it. -Made It More Stable, (View Picture's) -Fixed Most Of The Special Attack's. -Put Right Requirement's On most Item's I could think of. -Moved Home, A More Convienant Place. I saw The Pk thing On another server, I liekd it so i used, You will see what i mean in the picture's. -Corrected Alot Of The item bonus's And Price's -Added A Server Automessedge, You Can Change this, Or remove it. -Shop's Are Easier to find. -Removed Alot of the Portal's, Kept a few. -Removed The Login Welcome Screen, The purple one with the latest Update, Owner on etc, I made a new login messedge, Witch is the Rule's. -Added Npc Dialogue's -Added Perfect Dragon Claw Spec, (Hit's 4 time's, All hit's Deal Damage) -Got Rid Of Slayer Chest's Now Working Slayer, Kill Npc's For slayer
Client Has The following: -100% working & cleaned catche -Working Orb's, Run, Prayer & hitpoint. -Working Top Right Corner Door Logout -Their Are Only a few custom's, Some people Like, Some People dont, So i went into the middle, Their is only, 3 custom cape's (DeathCape, Demonic Death cape, Heroic Cape, Personally I like them) Dragon Claw's, And Full void (Not added into server, Go to class 8 to find id's) if you do not want these item's Into the server, Just simply rmeove from the store's. -Jframe, I have left all the Button's with no link's Attached, All yo uhave to do is go to Gui.Java and change these. Easy peezy. -Welcome Bot. -Got rid of all the un-Needed Model's, Client Load's fast.
Now For The Picture's.
[img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/736/1231ic.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/4348/fantasyscapei.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img183.imageshack.us/img183/6162/skillsc.jpg[/img]
[size=30pt]DONT FORGET TO JOIN OUR NEW COMMUNITY MARVIN-MRC.COM![/size]

item.title: [317][RELEASE]Matrix [RELEASE][317]
item.dc:creator: @killer90210 killer90210
item.description:
@killer90210 wrote:

hey dumb shit no advertising[quote=“wiggah, post:1, topic:301827”][center]

Server Name: MatrixScape
Server Base: Deltascape (Dont Flame About this till you read on)
Client Base Is: Bluur’s.

Credits
Server - Delta / Me
Client - Bluurr

Please Do No Flam Me, I Only want Advice on how to improve, Not Put Down’s.

COMMENT if you like or downloading!!! please rate if you think i deserve

Link’s
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?kzgzijkuezu
Server: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KG78Q74U
Website: http://marvin-mrc.com

Features
-Working God wars
-new GS Stances
-100% combat & skill timers with 100% real emotes
-50% xp update not fast and not slw
-donation system added already.
-donor shop
-new pestcontrol
-new pking system
-new pvp drops/pking skull
-and many more.

What I did:
-100% combat & skills real emotes and timers
-fixed Dragon Claws
-new customs
-added donor shop
-pking exchange
-Cleaned Server, Halfed The Size.
-Fixed All Bug’s I know of From Hiyascape, Including a few dupe method’s.
-Removed Prayer Draining, Lag’s Server, No Need.
-Removed All Npc speech’s that were above their head, For example, “General store trade me!” Lag’s Server, No need for it.
-Made It More Stable, (View Picture’s)
-Fixed Most Of The Special Attack’s.
-Put Right Requirement’s On most Item’s I could think of.
-Moved Home, A More Convienant Place. I saw The Pk thing On another server, I liekd it so i used, You will see what i mean in the picture’s.
-Corrected Alot Of The item bonus’s And Price’s
-Added A Server Automessedge, You Can Change this, Or remove it.
-Shop’s Are Easier to find.
-Removed Alot of the Portal’s, Kept a few.
-Removed The Login Welcome Screen, The purple one with the latest Update, Owner on etc, I made a new login messedge, Witch is the Rule’s.
-Added Npc Dialogue’s
-Added Perfect Dragon Claw Spec, (Hit’s 4 time’s, All hit’s Deal Damage)
-Got Rid Of Slayer Chest’s Now Working Slayer, Kill Npc’s For slayer

Client Has The following:
-100% working & cleaned catche
-Working Orb’s, Run, Prayer & hitpoint.
-Working Top Right Corner Door Logout
-Their Are Only a few custom’s, Some people Like, Some People dont, So i went into the middle, Their is only, 3 custom cape’s (DeathCape, Demonic Death cape, Heroic Cape, Personally I like them) Dragon Claw’s, And Full void (Not added into server, Go to class 8 to find id’s) if you do not want these item’s Into the server, Just simply rmeove from the store’s.
-Jframe, I have left all the Button’s with no link’s Attached, All yo uhave to do is go to Gui.Java and change these. Easy peezy.
-Welcome Bot.
-Got rid of all the un-Needed Model’s, Client Load’s fast.

Now For The Picture’s.

[size=30pt]DONT FORGET TO JOIN OUR NEW COMMUNITY
MARVIN-MRC.COM![/size][/quote]
